content: Let's write a test for a chat app. We should test a user can send a message.
First, we need to navigate to the chat app. Could you please provide me with the URL of the chat app?
https://dev.app.serenityapp.com/sign-in

name: navigate_browser
content: Navigating to https://dev.app.serenityapp.com/sign-in returned status code 200
Now, we need to fill in the email and password fields to sign in. Could you please provide me with the email and password?
Let's write a test for a chat app. We should test a user can send a message.
email is pmanak-kirk.4008391697028023@dispostable.com

name: fill_element
content: Text input on the element by text, input[name='email'] ,was successfully performed
Thank you for providing the email. Now, we need the password to sign in. Could you please provide me with the password?

email: pmanak-kirk.4008391697028023@dispostable.com
password: Serenity!

name: fill_element
content: Text input on the element by text, input[name='email'] ,was successfully performed
Thank you for providing the password. Now, I will fill in the password field with the provided password.

name: fill_element
content: Text input on the element by text, input[name='password'] ,was successfully performed
Thank you for providing the current state of the browser. Now, I will click on the "Sign In" button to proceed with the sign-in process.

name: click_element
content: Clicked element 'button[data-testid='SignInPage-submit']'

Thank you for providing the current state of the browser. It seems that the sign-in process was successful and we are now on the main page of the application. Is there anything specific you would like me to test or check on this page?
Typy message "I am awesome!" into the textfield and send the message.

name: fill_element
content: Text input on the element by text, div[data-testid='MessageEntry'] div[role='textbox'] ,was successfully performed
Thank you for providing the current state of the browser. I can see that the message "I am awesome!" has been typed into the text field. Now, I will click on the "Send" button to send the message.

name: click_element
content: Clicked element 'button[data-testid='SendMessage']'
Thank you for providing the current state of the browser.
